results.title: Treatment of social phobia with atenolol.
results.text_hl: Side effects were minimal. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ appears to work in @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@social phobic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ by reducing autonomic nervous system response to @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@phobic@@@ stimuli.

citations.NLM: Gorman JM, Liebowitz MR, Fyer AJ, Campeas R, Klein DF. Treatment of social phobia with atenolol. J Clin Psychopharmacol. 1985 Oct;5(5):298-301. PMID: 4044884

results.title: Social phobia: a comparison of behavior therapy and atenolol.
results.text_hl: ...Seventy-two @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@social phobics@@@ were randomly assigned to behavioral (@DISEASE_Flood_Factor_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:C565009 @@@flooding@@@) or drug treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or placebo.

results.title: Effects of selective beta-adrenoceptor blockade on anxiety associated with flight phobia.
results.text_hl: The present study is aimed at studying the effects of selective beta-adrenoceptor blockade on @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ in subjects with @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@flight phobia@@@. Using an incomplete block design subjects received a @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta-1@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 2 x 50 mg), a @GENE_IGKV5_2 @GENE_28907 @@@beta-2@@@ (@CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118 551@@@ 3 x 50 mg) selective blocking drug, or placebo on three occasions over a 16 h period under double-blind conditions prior to a 1/2 h flight.

citations.NLM: Ekeberg O, Kjeldsen SE, Greenwood DT, Enger E. Effects of selective beta-adrenoceptor blockade on anxiety associated with flight phobia. J Psychopharmacol. 1990 Jan;4(1):35-41. PMID: 22282925
citations.BibTeX: @article{22282925, title={Effects of selective beta-adrenoceptor blockade on anxiety associated with flight phobia.}, author={Ekeberg O and Kjeldsen SE and Greenwood DT and Enger E}, journal={J Psychopharmacol}, volume={4}, number={1}, pages={35-41}}

results.title: Effect of beta-receptor blockade on anxiety with reference to the three-systems model of phobic behavior.
results.text_hl: ...14 @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@phobic@@@ subjects were given @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (Inderal), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Tenormin@@@) and placebo in a double-blind fashion according to a repeated measurement design.

results.title: [Neurobiology and pharmacotherapy of social phobia].
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Moclobemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020912 @@@Moclobemide@@@ has been the most widely studied but produced unconvincingly therapeutic effects on @<m>DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@social phobic symptoms@@@.
